full_summary:
## RFQ: Construction Manager Services for RSS NCR Main and TerraCanada NCR Projects
### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3819788409
* **Publication Date**: January 16, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 3, 2023, 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: February 26, 2023

### Project Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services is issuing a Request for Qualification (RFQ) for Construction Manager Services for two projects: RSS NCR Main and TerraCanada NCR.

### Contracting Entity
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Notice URL
* **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15142969?extsite=MTUxNDI5NjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15142969?extsite=MTUxNDI5NjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Solicitation Details
The RFQ is an Invitation to Qualify for the provision of Construction Manager Services. The contracting process is open bidding. 

### Procurement Category
* **Procurement Category**: CNST

### Trade Agreements
The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Contract Duration
No expected contract start or end date is specified.

### Regions of Delivery
* The contract will be delivered
